messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] jargon- and a litte "research"
messages.msgSnippet: Just out of pure curiousity, and to confirm what I thought had taken place, I went back to the archives to follow the Christian thread   If anyone really
messages.messageBody:
Just out of pure curiousity, and to confirm what I thought had taken place, I
went back to the archives to follow the "Christian thread" If anyone really
cares, and just to completely, and with documented sources, wants to see how
the thread started (without sorting through hundreds of posts), the original
post was # 63844, Ang's reply was #63846, which started the "Christians
again" thread. Then in post #
63902, another reference was made to "Christian homeschoolers" and I
responded with post #63910. Sometimes it makes things more clear to go
back to the beginning and read from there

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
